heading: Devin A I
markdown_content:
# 👨‍💻 Software Engineer — 11+ Years of Experience

## 🔹 Professional Summary  
I am an experienced **Software Engineer** with over **11 years in software development**, specializing in **Python-based systems**, backend engineering, and automation.  
My journey spans building **enterprise-grade web applications**, **AI-powered agents**, and **large-scale automation solutions** that simplify complex workflows.  
I thrive in designing **scalable architectures**, mentoring teams, and leveraging **modern AI frameworks** to bring automation into real-world business contexts.  

---

## 🔹 Technical Expertise  

- **Programming & Frameworks**: Python, Django, FastAPI, Flask, Celery  
- **AI & Agents**: LangChain, OpenAI API, Agent-based frameworks, Conversational AI  
- **Automation & Orchestration**: Workflow automation, RPA, Ansible, Fabric  
- **DevOps & Cloud**: AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3), OCI, CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions  
- **Databases**: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, MongoDB  
- **Frontend (Working Knowledge)**: React, Bootstrap, HTML5, jQuery  
- **Collaboration & Tools**: Git, Jira, Docker, REST & GraphQL APIs  

---

## 🔹 Key Projects  

### 🚀 Intelligent Support Agent (2024 – Present)  
- Built an **AI-powered automation agent** to handle **customer support workflows**.  
- Integrated **LangChain + OpenAI API** for natural language understanding.  
- Automated ticket classification, response drafting, and FAQ resolution — reduced manual workload by **60%**.  
- Deployed on **OCI** with **scalable microservices** and background tasks using Celery.

---

### 🛠️ Infrastructure Automation System (2023)  
- Designed an **Ansible + Python automation framework** for managing **Oracle database clusters** through a gateway server.  
- Enabled **zero-touch deployments**, health checks, and backup management.  
- Built a web UI (Django + Bootstrap) for real-time monitoring and control.  
- Outcome: Reduced **manual intervention by 75%** and increased deployment reliability.

---

### 📊 Financial Data Processing Pipeline (2021–2022)  
- Developed a **high-volume ETL pipeline** in Python to process **10M+ financial records daily**.  
- Used **Pandas + PostgreSQL** for transformation and storage.  
- Added real-time dashboards (Plotly, React) for data insights.  
- Reduced report generation time from **hours to minutes**.

---

### 🌐 Large-Scale Web Application (2017–2020)  
- Led backend development for a **Django-based SaaS platform** serving 50k+ users.  
- Implemented **role-based access**, audit logs, and REST APIs consumed by mobile apps.  
- Designed **multi-tenant database architecture** for scalability.  
- Mentored junior developers and established coding best practices.

---

### 📦 Automation for CI/CD (2015–2016)  
- Built **custom deployment scripts** in Python and Bash for CI/CD pipelines.  
- Automated builds, testing, and deployment to staging/production servers.  
- Transitioned legacy apps to containerized environments (Docker).  

---

## 🔹 Career Timeline  
- **2024–Present**: AI & Automation Engineer — Building intelligent agents & automation systems  
- **2021–2023**: Senior Backend Engineer — Designed ETL pipelines & data systems  
- **2017–2020**: Full-Stack Developer — SaaS web app development at scale  
- **2012–2016**: Software Engineer — Python backend, CI/CD, infrastructure automation  

---

## 🔹 Current Focus  
- Building **AI-powered agents** that integrate with enterprise workflows.  
- Researching **autonomous automation frameworks** for DevOps and business ops.  
- Exploring **multi-agent systems** for collaborative task automation.  

---

## ✅ Personal Note  
Passionate about **clean, maintainable code** and using automation to solve complex problems.  
I believe in **continuous learning** and often experiment with **emerging AI frameworks** to push the boundaries of what’s possible.  
Outside of work, I enjoy **tech blogging, open-source contributions, and mentoring budding developers**.
